file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 05-30-10-06 - SERVICE DOOR - INTERNAL - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL SERVICE DOOR - INTERNAL - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives SMRD Zonal Task 52-Z821-214-001-A00. B. Zone: 821. C. Zone Boundaries: STA X = 4514.0 thru STA X = 5292.0. D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY SERVICE DOOR - INTERNAL GENERAL ALL 05-30-10-200-801-A ♦ VISUAL INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 05-30-10 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 05-30-10-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. SERVICE DOOR - INTERNAL GENERAL VISUAL INSPECTION A. General (1) This task gives instructions to do Zonal Task 52-Z821-214-001-A00. (2) The internal general visual inspection (GVI) of zone 821 must be done within a touching distance of the items examined. (3) It is a GVI to find damage, failure, or irregular conditions that can be seen easily. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 25-23-05-000-801-A/400 SERVICE DOOR LINING PANELS - REMOVAL AMM TASK 25-51-02-400-801-A/400 BAGGAGE DOOR LINING - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-802-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-802-A/400 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Standard Ladder To get access to the inspection area E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Service door I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Put the ladder in position. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-30-10 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Remove the service door lining (AMM TASK 25-23-05-000-801-A/400). (3) Remove the thermoacoustic insulation from the service door (AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-801-A/400) or (AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-802-A/400), as applicable. (4) Open the service door. J. Service Door - Internal General Visual Inspection (Figure 601) SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Examine the service door for loose rivets, nicks, cracks, dents, erosion, corrosion, deteriorated protective treatment, and foreign objects (Figure 601). (2) Examine the locking spring and pivoting mechanism for condition (Figure 601). (3) Examine the folding flap and rubber trim seal for condition. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the thermoacoustic insulation on the service door (AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-801-A/400) or (AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-802-A/400), as applicable. (2) Install the lining ( AMM TASK 25-51-02-400-801-A/400). (3) Remove the ladder. (4) Close the service door. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-30-10 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
